this_title: Instructions on How to Make a Film
introduction: Shot at the independent imaging retreat of Film Farm in Mount Forest, Canada, this comedy is a quest about performance, educational voice-over, analogue filmmaking, ASCII, language, ethics of ethnography and narrative storytelling under a metaphor of instructions to farm land. Texts both in image and sound by Barbara Kirshenblatt-Gimblett and wikiHow/shoot-film.
chinese_title: Instructions on How to Make a Film
